application

Class ObjImporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.ObjImporter

  • public class ObjImporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for importing .obj models into a renderer. Imports them as a CustomObject object. Requires as much memory as the .obj file size. Currently supports object files with only triangular faces, no groups and will only use one material form the file.
    Author:
    Sam Dark

      • addNormalAndTextureToVertex

        private static java.lang.String addNormalAndTextureToVertex(java.lang.String inp)
        Adds a normal and texture coordinate (if present) to a vertex given a face triplet in the form "x/y/z" where y and z are optional
        Parameters:
        inp - A face triplet (for example "4/15/11")
        Returns:
        The vertex specified in the face triplet
